law.history: Repealed 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 324, sec. 61, effective July 13, 1984. -- Amended 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 14, sec. 267, effective January 2, 1978. -- Amended 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 237, sec. 7. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 165a-13, 165a-16.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Department to take charge of insolvent institution -- Warning against unsafe policies -- Appointment of receiver.
